cast.original_title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes
cast.overview: 64 years before he becomes the tyrannical president of Panem, Coriolanus Snow sees a chance for a change in fortunes when he mentors Lucy Gray Baird, the female tribute from District 12.
cast.title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes

details.biography: Max Raphael is a British actor, best known for his leading roles in 'Slaughterhouse Rulez' and 'School's Out Forever'. Born July 22, 2001 in London, he started acting at an early age, and is a member of the National Youth Theatre of Great Britain. He is most well known for his roles in 'Slaughterhouse Rulez' (2018) with Simon Pegg, Asa Butterfield and Margot Robbie, 'School's Out Forever' (2020) and 'Black Beauty' (2020).
details.name: Max Raphael
